channel.title: How do I put stuff shops... PLEASE HELP
channel.description: How do I make things avaialble in shops, for example, a dragon chainbody in Varrock general store.

item.title: How do I put stuff shops... PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

Go to shops.cfg (open with notepad)

then, there will be item codes … edit those to what you want…
the one next to it shows the amount being sold etc.

shop = 47	@red@Mods_item_shop				2	2	1038	9999999	1040	9999999	1042	9999999	1044	9999999	1046	9999999	1048	9999999	1053	9999999	1055	9999999	1057	9999999	1419	9999999	1038	9999999	1050	9999999	1052	9999999	775	9999999	1023	9999999	2922	9999999	3057	9999999	3058	9999999	3059	9999999	3060	9999999	3061	9999999

thats one, shows how many (999999) then what there code is.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I put stuff shops... PLEASE HELP

@udluv2 wrote:

Go to shops.cfg and then find the shop u want to add it to. Go to the end and add the item Id in.
